title: Test equipment
fullText:
For guidance on the selection and use of test equipment, refer to AS/NZS 3017.
Measuring instruments should comply with either AS 61010.1 and the IEC 61557 series or provide the same or better levels of performance and safety.
All measuring instruments shall be â€”
(a) checked for damage and correct operation prior to testing;
(b) used in accordance with their design operating criteria; and
(c) confirmed as accurate at appropriate intervals.
